DOC.brief_summary: DES-OSA P-SAP score validate detect OSA ( Obstructive Sleep Apnea ) . One item P-SAP DES-OSA measurement neck circumference . The aim study compare influence different method neck circumference measurement accuracy DES-OSA P-SAP score detect OSA .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Different Methods Measurement Accuracy DES-OSA P-SAP Scores
DOC.criteria: All patient schedule anesthetic preoperative consultation < 18 year
